name: The Listener (Christopher Dantinne)
description:
"A man can't cope with all these unpleasant frequencies about."

Stress is consuming your body. Concerned for your well being, your friend offers you to stay at his guest house where he can make sure you're alright. But something has followed the both of you home, and it doesn't plan on leaving until it finds you. Keep quiet... just because it's blind doesn't mean it can't see. With just a faulty radio and a dying candle in front of you, will you be able to ward it off?
